articles.title: Predicted Chelsea starting XI vs Wolves as Frank Lampard debates Mount and Aubameyang decisions - Football.London
articles.description: Frank Lampard will select his first Chelsea starting lineup since making his dramatic return to Stamford Bridge when his side make the trip to Wolves on Saturday for Premier League action
articles.content: Chelsea have moved on from a coach who was selecting his first team in football against Liverpool, to one who has picked a Chelsea side in 84 competitive games before. Frank Lampard will do so once a… [+3041 chars]

articles.description: Manchester City face off against Southampton on Saturday and here is the starting XI Pep Guardiola should select.
articles.content:
Manchester City travel down to the south coast to take on Southampton on Saturday.

articles.title: Chelsea news: Frank Lampard finally gets Mykhaylo Mudryk wish as squad silence broken - The Mirror
articles.description: Frank Lampard will take charge of Chelsea once again this weekend as they take on Wolves and could hand an opportunity to Mykhaylo Mudryk, who he wanted to sign at Everton
articles.content:
Frank Lampard is back at Chelsea and readying for the first game of his second stint against Wolves. 
A lot can change in a week and the Blues have managed to sack Graham Potter and re-appoint Lampa… [+3253 chars]
